se.story:
You are standing in front of a crossing and you
are free to choose any live-changing road.

You are laying in your prison and the door suddenly unlocks.
The smell of freedom approaches you...
se.optionNeg: You turn around and continue sleeping.

se.story: A mystic pocket digi of high value suddenly appears straight in front of you!
You are the lucky finder of a lottery ticket with the right numbers!!!
se.optionNeg: Hmmm... *checks Wallet* I still have 10 bucks, I’m fine.

se.story:
You have been randomly selected from 1000 people for
an VIP meeting with headmaster Gandalf, in person!
se.optionNeg: I cannot leave, I need to eat my sandwich.

se.story: You start rolling, down a hill..
You wake up in a cabin on a ship.
se.optionNeg: I'm the Captain of this ship and I feel like ordering myself to walk the plank.
